chapter.title: Multiplexer (MUX)
chapter.para: The Multiplexer (MUX) is designed as a stack wrapper. It serves two purposes:

listitem.para: It exposes the stack and allows it to be shared between multiple listeners. The stack follows the life cycle of the MUX. It is created and destroyed with MUX.

Exposes the management operations for JMX clients, one of them being the &MANAGEMENT.PLATFORM; Console. For specific information please refer to the &THIS.PLATFORM; Diameter Management Console User Guide.
